name: C.Q.C. - Close Quarters Combat
description: Fight in this action-packed and fun top-down shooter against hordes of zombies, complete objectives and blaze your trail in 4 different settings. Stand your ground with up to four players in a local split screen COOP match or fight against your friends in a variety of PvP maps.
